post.author: 임기순
post.content:
One of TEKsystems' clients, located in Brampton, is currently seeking an Application Support Consultant. The ideal candidate will have experience supporting several Java applications within a Weblogic environment. This contract is scheduled to run for 11 months.
This position requires someone who will be able to identify root cause problems within the applications and work to figure out where the problem exists. There will be no development or testing within this role. This is a non-production environment supporting 90-100 applications.
Required Experience:
- Strong Weblogic configuration skills
- Strong problem analysis and diagnostic skills related to application failures
- Strong Database skills, specifically Oracle and SQL
- Previous experience in a support role in either Production or Test environments
- Strong Unix command and scripting skills
If you are interested in hearing more about this opportunity, please contact me as soon as possible. If you reach my voicemail, please press ‘0’ to have the receptionist page me. In the interim, please also send an updated word version of your resume. If you are unavailable at this time, but do know of someone who would be interested, please feel free to pass along my contact information. Thank you in advance for your time.
____________________________________________ Nicole Padfield PROFESSIONAL RECRUITER 350 Burnhamthorpe Road West, Suite 700, Mississauga, Ontario, L5B 3J1 800.254.0778 905.283.1327 WWW.TEKSYSTEMS.CA
post.title: Application Support Consultant (CONTRACT)
